mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure all text and buttons are legible without zooming on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and implement lazy loading for improved speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Use descriptive alt text for all images and optimize meta tags for better search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve site navigation by adding a sticky menu for easier access to key pages.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps to complete a reservation.
tips: Consider integrating a live chat feature for customer support.
Review and optimize the content to focus on the target audience's needs.
